notes: If using Cocoa powder, for every 1 oz chocolate, use 3 tbsp cocoa powder + 1 tbsp butter
recipe: Melt butter and chocolate over low heat. Stir and blend well, then add the boiling water
Stir and blend well, then add the sugar and corn syrup
Let the sauce come to a boil, stirring slowly over low heat. Simmer for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally
